channel.title: editorial design on random user oriented graphic design
channel.description: Recent content in editorial design on random user oriented graphic design

item.title: The Sun Also Rising
item.description: Project: Ernest Hemingway - The Sun Also Rises book cover | Client: rausr.com | Year: 2020 Description: My actual edition of this great Hemingway’s book is dressed in some senile cover. That’s why I decided to create a fresh modern cover that reflects every important part of whole piece.

item.title: Green Hills of Africa
item.description: Project: Ernest Hemingway - Green Hills of Africa book cover | Client: rausr.com | Year: 2020 Description: My actual edition of this great Hemingway’s book is dressed in some senile cover. item.title: Slnko hrej CD cover
item.description: Project: Album Cover - Slnko, hrej! | Client: Lucia Briestenská | Year: 2016 Description: “Slnko, hrej!” is the debut album by singer-songwriter Lucia Briestenská. “Slnko, hrej!” in translation it means something like: “Sun, shine!”.
